listtransclusions-header: Text displayed at the beginning of the special page
listtransclusions-footer: Text displayed at the end of the special page
listtransclusions-title: Special page title (parameter $1 is the target page title)
listtransclusions-backlink: Backlink title (parameter $1 is the target page title)
listtransclusions-invalid: Error displayed when the specified title is invalid.
listtransclusions-notexist: Error displayed when the target page does not exist (parameter $1 is the target page title)
listtransclusions-tpls: Introductory text for templates (parameter $1 is the target page title)
listtransclusions-tpls-no: Text displayed when no templates are used (parameter $1 is the target page title)
listtransclusions-imgs: Introductory text for images (parameter $1 is the target page title)
listtransclusions-imgs-no: Text displayed when no images are used (parameter $1 is the target page title)
accesskey-t-listtransclusions: Access key for the toolbox menu item
tooltip-t-listtransclusions: Tooltip for the toolbox menu item
